entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DragInteraction crashes GraphicsView embedded in ScrollView when deployed to Android device #22434
  • Further expand on button tests #22433
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Bindings to Width and Height of a Control never stop triggering, even if size did not change at all. #22432
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Image disappears when switching tabs in TabBar #22427
    Backlog
  • TableView - TableSection - Cells disappear when custom cells are updated on WinUI #22424
    Backlog
  • WebView Ctrl+F find dialog doesn't show up in Release without debugger attached #22423
  • AppStore publishing - AppIcon missing #22421
  • Image caching #22418
  • [MAUI] The list does not show newly added recipes #22417
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Missing NavigationBar and other elements while opening the app from sticky foreground service. #22416
  • The "ProjectReference" rule is missing the "{ItemType}" property. When Publishing maui android app #22415

Closed

  • Freezing App when Navigating Between Tabs with BlazorWebView in Maui Blazor App #22344
  • Multi-Project App Template is not generating a solution file when used from CLI #21188
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    community ✨
  • Fix arcade warnings and update versions #22428
    area-infrastructure
  • enable css for StackBase, remove for StackLayout #22419
    community ✨
  • Just trigger SizeChanged when Window size changes #22413
    community ✨, area-controls-window

Merged

  • [ci] Improve maestro artifact publishing #22431
    area-infrastructure
  • Ignore warning for nuget restore #22436
  • Don't propagate VE.Frame changes back down to the Handler #22347
    area-controls-general
  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #22276
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-button
  • [arcade] Move to arcade 8.0 for main and to use new Version system #22400
    area-infrastructure
  • Revert "Add (back) VSMac feedback tool mention when move-to-vs-feedback label is applied" #22420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Remove implicit reference to Maui Compatibility and template references #22203
    area-templates
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leaks in `*Cell` #22067
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-listview, memory-leak 💦
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) #21818
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, layout-grid, t/perf
  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟, area-testing
  • [Android] Action mode menu doesn't disappear when switch on another tab - fix #21231
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Core] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #21962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, community ✨
  • Prevent measure in flexlayout during arrange pass #22411
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, layout-flex
  • [net9.0] Update to net9 preview5 #22399
    area-infrastructure
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨, Backlog
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
  • Fix Android ImageButton background, ripple and padding #22298
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Not display InputAccessoryView closing the Software keyboard #22394
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • [iOS] CollectionView item sizing wrong after refresh #21736
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
